page.title: 05PARENTS OCCUPATIONS
page.content: We asked all the children in the school what time of work their parents did.We meant of course paid work.Perhaps years ago many people would have worked mostly in the docks and on fishing boats.However nowadays there are more who work in shops than any other single job.Next on our survey list came jobs in hotels or guest houses, and close behind came the building industry. A good number still work on fishing boats, but several of these are only during the summer, taking visitors out on fishing trips.
